title: pr2 screw joint test failure in ode

content.raw:
I just noticed a failure of a pr2 screw joint test in ODE. I didn't notice it in Jenkins because the pr2 tests weren't being run.
~~~
239: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PR2Test.ScrewJoint/0
239: [Msg] Waiting for master.
239: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
239: [Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.183
239: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 2.7 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
239: [Dbg] [pr2.cc:140] motor 4.15237
239: [Dbg] [pr2.cc:141] screw -3.1173e-06
239: [Dbg] [pr2.cc:142] link  -7.6e-05 -0.001971 0.000443
239: /tmp/gazebo_build/source/test/integration/pr2.cc:143: Failure
239: Expected: (link->GetWorldLinearVel().z) > (1e-3), actual: 0.0004425 vs 0.001
239: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
239: [  FAILED  ] PhysicsEngines/PR2Test.ScrewJoint/0, where GetParam() = "ode" (4351 ms)
~~~
For reference, a portion of the simbody console output (which passes):
~~~
239: [ RUN      ] PhysicsEngines/PR2Test.ScrewJoint/2
239: [Msg] Waiting for master.
239: [Msg] Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
239: [Msg] Publicized address: 192.168.1.183
239: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:144] ServerFixture load in 1.1 seconds, timeout after 600 seconds
239: [Dbg] [pr2.cc:140] motor 10.0769
239: [Dbg] [pr2.cc:141] screw 10.0769
239: [Dbg] [pr2.cc:142] link  -3e-05 -1.2e-05 0.003239
239: [Dbg] [ServerFixture.cc:95] ServerFixture::Unload
239: [       OK ] PhysicsEngines/PR2Test.ScrewJoint/2 (10992 ms)
~~~
I'm not sure which versions are affected. I think @hsu knows where the problem is.
